description.raw:
Normal maps have not been working for some time, and we have also disabled them in the gazebo models that use them, e.g. see [this line in fast_food's model.sdf](#!/osrf/gazebo_models/src/ea482a46e821ac9fe9618e469c5bf65742b42eb1/fast_food/model.sdf?fileviewer=file-view-default#model.sdf-28)

The fix only works for ubuntu with OGRE 1.9. I tried applying the same changes to the shaders in our `media/rtshaderlib` directory used by gazebo on OSX but still didn't have any luck so I disabled normal mapping on OSX for now. 

I also removed unused material scripts in the rtshader directories.

See a screenshot of the fast food model before and after applying its normal map.

Before:

![fastfood_no_normal.jpg](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/225576924-fastfood_no_normal.jpg)

After:

![fastfood_normal.jpg](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/3812733778-fastfood_normal.jpg)
